snippet: Webb Simpson leads the Wells Fargo Championship by a shot, but Rory McIlroy, the No. 2-ranked player in the world, is two strokes behind.
abstract: Webb Simpson takes third-round lead at the Wells Fargo Championship golf tournament, but Rory McIlroy, two strokes behind, might be in the best position heading into the final round.
lead_paragraph: Webb Simpson leads the Wells Fargo Championship by a shot, but Rory McIlroy, the No. 2-ranked player in the world, is two strokes behind.

headline.seo: Simpson Leads Wells Fargo Championship, but McIlroy Lurks
headline.main: Alone in Lead, Simpson Glances Over His Shoulder
headline.print_headline: Alone in the Lead, Simpson Glances Over His Shoulder
